name: droningly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a sound or a voice) in a way that continues for a long time without changing in sound, usually when this is boring: She was speaking droningly about something or other, but nobody was listening. He droningly moaned about his job to anyone that would listen. Related word
droning
More examplesFewer examplesThe music sounded droningly repetitive.The actor's narration of the story was droningly flat.Fat flies buzzed droningly against the window panes.She continued to talk droningly until I eventually fell asleep.
